    • Method Detail

      • makeLPTBound

        public static SharedSchedule makeLPTBound(Schedule schedule,
                          java.util.List<Job> jobs)
        Compute the LPT approximation for a given task list and a given number of computers. The approximation is bounded by Fapprox/Foptimal = 4/3 - 1/3m
        Parameters:
        schedule - schedule that is used in the computation
        jobs - list of jobs to be scheduled
        Returns:
        A SharedSchedule containing the LPT approx. schedule

      • makeInfBound

        public static SharedSchedule makeInfBound()
        Compute the LPT approximation for a given task list and a given number of computers.
        Returns:
        A SharedSchedule with cost Integer.MAX_VALUE

      • makeListBound

        public static SharedSchedule makeListBound(Schedule schedule,
                           java.util.List<Job> jobs)
        Compute the List approximation for a given task list and a given number of computers. The approximation is bounded by Fapprox/Foptimal = 2 - 1/m
        Parameters:
        schedule - schedule that is used in the computation
        jobs - list of jobs to be scheduled
        Returns:
        A SharedSchedule containing the List approx. schedule
